title: Lego World - IGG Games
description:
Noticed there wasn't a clean working version of this game on here so I shared one I found on the internet.

Game Information:

EXPLORE. DISCOVER. CREATE.

LEGOÃ‚Â® Worlds is a galaxy of procedurally-generated Worlds made entirely of LEGO bricks which you can freely manipulate and dynamically populate with LEGO models. Explore each World and unlock new discoveries: from cowboys and giraffes to vampires and polar bears, to steamrollers, race cars, and colossal digging machines! Use the multi-tool to shape environments and alter any World to your liking: raise the terrain to create vast mountain ranges, or enter the Brick-by-Brick editor to build anything you can imagine. Save your creations to build with them again. LEGO Worlds enables you to populate your Worlds with many weird and wonderful characters, creatures, models, and driveable vehicles, and then play out your own unique adventures. Probably not worth upsetting the Skeletons thoughÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

LEGO Worlds is currently in Early Access, so be sure to keep coming back for news on updates and plans for future development, as well as discussions with the people behind the scenes. 

Explore and Discover the Surprises within LEGO Worlds
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Uncover hidden treasures in environments that range from the fun to the fantastical.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Make your worlds come to life with customizable characters, both friendly and fearsome
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Race, soar, zoom, and ride on a variety of vehicles and creatures from diggers and helicopters to horses and dragons

Create and Customize your own LEGO World
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Build any world you can imagine using the brick-by-brick editor tool and prefabricated LEGO structures
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Modify terrain quickly and easily with the multi-tool.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Customize your characters in a wide variety of outfits and options.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play with a select number of real-life LEGO sets, taken from the Classic and current LEGO themes!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Export your creations and save them to use again.

Expand your LEGO World
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ More content, features, and new LEGO play sets to be added in future updates. 

System Requirement:
Minimum:

    OS: Windows XP SP3
    Processor: Intel Dual Core 2GHz
    Memory: 2 GB RAM
    Graphics: 512MB GPU with Shaders 3.0
    DirectX: Version 10
    Network: Broadband Internet connection
    Hard Drive: 10 GB available space

Recommended:

    OS: Windows 7
    Processor: AMD or Intel Quad Core running at 2.6GHz
    Memory: 4 GB RAM
    Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 480 or ATI Radeon HD 5850 or better
    DirectX: Version 11
    Network: Broadband Internet connection
    Hard Drive: 10 GB available space
